name: 24 ICE |FROZEN COCKTAILS
company-overview: 24 ICE has developed a unique range of frozen cocktails in the flavors Mojito, Strawberry Daiquiri, Limoncello, Pina Colada and Vodka Energy. The 24 ICE frozen cocktails contain 5% alcohol.

name: 3/4 OZ Craft Cocktail Mixers
company-overview: 3/4 OZ makes delicate natural syrups for both alcoholic and non alcoholic beverages.

name: A. Zorbas & Sons Ltd
company-overview: The main activity of A.Zorbas and Sons is the production, distribution of bakery and confectionery products. The Company maintains 64 stores all over Cyprus, as well as three production units.
